description: The tmnxEthRingPathFwdStateChange is generated when an Ethernet Ring
Path changes its forwarding state (tmnxEthRingPathFwdState) from
blocked to unblocked or from unblocked to blocked.

event.Summary: Ethernet ring path forwarding state changed to $v1

description: The value of tmnxEthRingPathFwdState indicates whether the Ethernet
Ring Node Path blocks the transmission and reception of traffic on the
ring port.
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingPathFwdState

description: The tmnxEthRingApsPrvsnRaiseAlarm is generated when an Ethernet Ring
provisioning mismatch is detected. A mismatch occurs when the RPL Owner
Node receives one or more No Request R-APS message(s) with RPL Blocked
status flag set (NR,RB) and a Node ID that differs from its own.
REFERENCE Draft ITU-T Recommendation G.8032/Y.1344 Version 2
Section 10.27

event.Summary: Ethernet ring provisioning mismatch is detected

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingApsPrvsnRaiseAlarm TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingDefectStatus b 0

description: The value of tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu indicates the contents of the R-APS
PDU transmitted on the Ethernet Ring.
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu

description: The value of tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu indicates the contents of the
R-APS PDU received on the Ethernet Ring path.
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu

description: The value of tmnxEthRingDefectStatus indicates what defects are
active on the Ethernet Ring.
The defects are defined as:
dFopPM -- Provisioning Mismatch
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingDefectStatus

description: The tmnxEthRingApsPrvsnClearAlarm is generated when an Ethernet Ring
provisioning mismatch is cleared.
REFERENCE Draft ITU-T Recommendation G.8032/Y.1344 Version 2
Section 10.27

event.Summary: Ethernet ring provisioning mismatch is cleared

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingApsPrvsnClearAlarm TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu s EXAMPLEEXAMPLE TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingDefectStatus b 0

description: The value of tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu indicates the contents of the R-APS
PDU transmitted on the Ethernet Ring.
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingTxApsPdu

description: The value of tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu indicates the contents of the
R-APS PDU received on the Ethernet Ring path.
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingPathRxApsPdu

description: The value of tmnxEthRingDefectStatus indicates what defects are
active on the Ethernet Ring.
The defects are defined as:
dFopPM -- Provisioning Mismatch
variables.name: TIMETRA-ETH-RING-MIB::tmnxEthRingDefectStatus
